main event: A civilian in Mississippi City reported observing a single reddish-yellow object flying east for 2 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed to have a reddish-yellow color, which occasionally appeared green.
It had two red balls or discs, and it maintained level flight for 2 minutes before disappearing.
result: Possible flare from an aircraft on training missions
sighted object: single reddish-yellow object with two red balls or discs
